image_requirements.description: Minimum dimension of file is: 2500 px; Maximum 36 px
Use professional studio lighting. Studio lighting should not produce any harsh shadows or bright back-lighting.
Do NOT shoot the products from far away and crop. Move the camera closer to the model or mannequin.
It is preferred you use a fit model. The model should stand with a straight pose, with no hip rotation or fixed limb movement.
Consider a mannequin with joints for better adjustment for special clothing features.
The mannequin color should be white; other colors can make it hard for the program to recognize.
The model's face should be out of frame when capturing.
Flat-lay images cannot be used. Products require volume of a body to work.
